es.uam.eps.bmi.search.indexing

Interface Index

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicIndex, StemIndex, StopwordIndex

    public interface Index
    Interface for index definition.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Builds an index from a collection of text documents.

      Returns a list of the IDs of indexed documents.

      Returns the module of the document with the given doc ID.

      Returns a document given its Id.

      Returns a list of postings of the given term.

      Returns the list of terms extracted from the indexed documents.
      boolean isLoaded()
      Returns a true if the index is loaded, false otherwise.

      Stores (partially or completely) a previously created index in memory.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        void build(java.lang.String inputCollectionPath,
           java.lang.String outputIndexPath,
           TextParser textParser)
        Builds an index from a collection of text documents.
        Parameters:
        inputCollectionPath - Path to the directory containing the collection of documents to be indexed.
        outputIndexPath - Path to the directory to store the indexes.
        textParser - Parser for document processing.

      • load

        void load(java.lang.String indexPath)
        Stores (partially or completely) a previously created index in memory.
        Parameters:
        indexPath - Path to the directory where the index is stored.

      • getPath

        java.lang.String getPath()
        Returns the path where the index is stored.

        the path where the index is stored.

      • getDocument

        TextDocument getDocument(int docId)
        Returns a document given its Id.
        Parameters:
        docId - Id of the document to retrieve.
        Returns:
        a TextDocument instance matching the given Id.

      • getTerms

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTerms()

      • getTermPostings

        Returns a list of postings of the given term.

        Returns:

      • isLoaded

        boolean isLoaded()
        Returns a true if the index is loaded, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if index is loaded, false otherwise.

        double getDocModule(int docID)
        Returns the module of the document with the given doc ID.

        Returns:
